property.name: Account
property.tp:docstring: Object path for the ytstenut account.

method.name: Hold
method.tp:docstring: Tell the account manager that the caller of this method is using the ytstenut account until the caller calls Release.

method.name: Release
method.tp:docstring: Tell the account manager that the caller is finished using the ytstenut account. This should only follow a successful call to Hold by the same caller.

tp:docstring.p: This interface is provided by the account manager at the path /com/meego/xpmn/ytstenut/AccountManager.

This account manager interface is used to discover the ytstenut account. This account is created automatically and is always present. Callers can use the Hold and Release methods to indicate their usage of the account. If at least one caller has indicated their usage of the account then the accounts presence will be set to available.
